data.name: Absinthe for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Absinthe is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Santiago del Estero, Argentina, but raised in Buenos Aires Absinthe has Italian and South American heritage.

Absinthe got her first tattoo when she was 16 and now the upper part of her body is inked. She's always loved tattoos, because they’re amazing. The work that goes into them, and the time, its nuts… And it’s an art form. Her tattoos are just one form of her self-expression. Each of her tattoos had a story or some meaning behind it. She's never just walked into a place, picked out a picture, and said I want that. In fact several of her tattoos have been designed by her, also drawn specifically for her.

Absinthe first started working in the adult entertainment industry in 2008 after she received an email from a strip club, that they want to offer her to make a solo show. And this offer was in time, because exactly in this time she came across videos on her husband’s computer of him fucking other girls. She was really mad and decided to change her life completely!

She worked a few years in this strip club and now she want to try heself on the street.

Help Absinthe to take her place on the street!

data.short_description: Absinthe is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
